definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[לִי]] ´[[לאׁ שׁ]]: Job 33:27 (si vera l.) it was not equalled to me, i.e. (v. infra; acc. to most) not requited (so De Di Da, and Is 16:6 Targum); Bu [[אֵל לאׁ שִׁוׇּה]] God did not requite (or [[שִׁלֵּם]] for [[שׁוה]]); Du [[לאׁ שִׁוׇּה כַעֲוֹנִי]] (cf. LXX); Impf. 1 s. of ´[[י]]:, [[אֶשְׁוֶה]]…[[אֶל־מִי]]: Is 40:25 to whom shall I be like ? (‖[[תְּדַמְּיוּנִי ]]), implying that he is incomp.; 3 mpl. [[לאׁ יִשְׁווּ־בָהּ]] Pr 3:15 are not comparable with her (wisdom), so Pr 8:11; 2 ms. [[פֶּן־תִּשְׁוֶה־לוֹ]] Pr 26:4 lest thou be like him (a fool); Pt. [[שׁׂוֶה בְּ]] Es 7:4 is not an equivalent for; c. [[לִ]], suitable for Es 3:8, so Es 1:22 Hi Or Ry:Kau (rdg. [[כּׂל שׁׂוֶה עִמּוֹ]] for [[כִּלְשׁוֹן עַמּוֹ]], but v. Siegf.); adequate for Es 5:13.
